documents.document: @DavidpbFerguson Nicely done man! Cool review. Speaking of Specimen, Look out for your inbox later!
@nellucnhoj Saw this in my subs earlier...it's 2008 again!

Imagine being so threatened by an ad saying we should show basic human decency to immigrants. Great message.
https://t.co/kdiEKxmxY6

For some reason Adult Swim UK just put all of Season 4.1 of The Venture Bros up online. Sure it's a Sunday!
https://t.co/m5y5B5h0a1

It's allowed.

A nice little history of cartoon gloves in animation.
https://t.co/ndDb84IufA
@kierongillen @McKelvie Wait a minute - I recognise these from old issues of Official Playstation magazine!Had no idea you guys created them
Blessed are those who participate in #hourlycomicday and who taste the fruits of insanity!
@Fluffy_Raptor I did something similar two years ago. Maybe an update? https://t.co/zR1SeVMWGl

@CoupeReVille I've got a list but yet still haven't beaten The Witcher 3 yet...
Damn you,Gwent.
6. Not technically a character but the DJ from Burnout was insufferable. Thankfully he could be muted. https://t.co/JORx2ZvNxG

Sign this petition & show @EndaKennyTD that we as a nation reject Trump's beliefs on immigration & his worldview.
https://t.co/iGR3InsjXz
5. If only I could be as cool as Harry Tipper. https://t.co/U82jMEjePj
4. This counts? Whatevs... https://t.co/C5LEQLVc5J
3. Kula World! Shame only so many copies exist. Very fun and challenging game about balls. And food items. https://t.co/rCdUKgfiXV
2. Of all the Snakes,it has to be the original, Naked Snake from MGS3. More grounded than any of the clones. https://t.co/5EAalsmUAB
1. The Simpsons Arcade game on a family holiday around 96? Marge is a rabbit apparently. https://t.co/gFnIihF5vx
This sounds like fun! I'll answer some when I get the time. *Spoiler warning to some of these answers.* https://t.co/zNO5UwPDmO
RIP John Hurt. A damn fine actor. Damn shame.
@nellucnhoj I hear u.Definitely depends on artist's worldview reflected in their work.Use it as incentive to prioritise discovering new art.
Updating you on the latest beef in the War of The Printers. https://t.co/QlqdprH4oa
@codenamewallaby Also - Brave New World. Both books that are essential reads in this moment in time.
Forgot to mention my #COLORISTAPPRECIATIONDAY shoutout which goes to @rebnalty for the amazing work on IM 3 cover! https://t.co/HdbFpYuaRh
This is big. https://t.co/MCSI6jG2Or
@Stephen_C_Ward Most importantly - make sure your page dimensions are accurate. Accomodate space for the inner margins.
@Stephen_C_Ward Focus on strengths and what you like to draw. Model sheet your characters,draw them from every angle you can.
3 days of Trump's presidency has already felt like two weeks have gone by. It's all so overwhelming...
@Fluffy_Raptor Ah here,get the slim already!
Read The Few last night,new Image title that came out last week. Good book,reminds me of Ashley Wood. Pick it up! https://t.co/RjcpWLBJXt
@DavidpbFerguson Ah you still cool David! The tweetage is all good. Just a bit of venting from the shitshow that was yesterday.
This piece was meant to be a part of an illustration that ended up being edited out. Ah well.… https://t.co/XFFTHMkSRc
@ten_bandits Aye. Given the style it was a surprise to me. Just shouldn't follow ALL your idols sometimes...
Days like this on twitter - you find out who are dickheads. There goes respect for an artist I admired.
Correction - Meitu. The one that turns you into cute anime character. Sketchy app is sketchy. AVOID
If you downloaded that Meiku app - uninstall it immediately. App send IMEI no. to China. More in thread. https://t.co/PKOHLJSGoV
@Katiecanartgood Really great body language here - communicates well without dialogue, nice one!
Superman is more of an American than Trump and his army of Fart-nuggets will ever be. Be proud and resist the hate. https://t.co/IAjWkdCqWb
@Fluffy_Raptor Best of luck yo! Posi vibes! https://t.co/6TTOdxN6af
@nellucnhoj @redbubble Unfortunately there's so much of it on the site. HBO took action a couple of years ago when GOT art was swiped.
Get your hands on this sweet anthology by emailing thecomicslab@gmail.com Price is €4!
Specimen arrived today! Final product turned out savage! Congrats to all the contributors! https://t.co/1OEG4SBICH
@nick_gonzo It's all about sneeple these days Nick,you know? Snake people. Identifiable by their love of wind instruments.
@SeanOhOgain @HugoBoylan @CoupeReVille @dearbhlala @pocketkerrie @jp_jordan @fffits @TheBigBang_ Nice one guys. Verdy good show!

Remember that time RTE got hacked by Russia?

Added some new artwork to my @redbubble store! More to come soon! https://t.co/nUQH8swQxM https://t.co/BEpyK0ZtzJ
The Father Ted World Cup begins. Cast your votes wisely. Some tough decisions! https://t.co/qUHw3KKV60
@Katiecanartgood @AdlaiM New Jack City I believe it's called. A classic!
Incandescent Memories got nominated for an ICN for Best Anthology! If you have a minute,give over a vote! https://t.co/FrRDaFlp0g
@HugoBoylan So glad I'm seeing a...following for Unfollow! Favourite Vertigo book in the last year.
Just got horrible news that my Grandmother passed on. RIP Margaret. You're at peace now.

A Letter from a Holocaust survivor warning about the rise of Fascism in The Irish Times in 1988.
https://t.co/69YE61ag0e
@ItsMacklin Terminator. Every. Time.
Already off to a wedding,year hasn't begun proper yet! https://t.co/2URcuphzVh
@roceidcal Ah cool,that would definitely work! Nah,couldn't offer money,it's cool! If an artist needed it,it was there for the taking.
@roceidcal No problem! Feel free to take it off my hands - will you be in Dublin any time soon?
@roceidcal Got a Wacom Bamboo that you can use if it's any convenience to you!
@eoinmarron Was a pleasure working with you this year. Always knew you'd go far. All the best for the year ahead!
@ten_bandits Happy New Year Ted! Good call on pizza,going to do the same meself!
@nvalkyrja Pizza is on the agenda tonight too! Great minds! Happy New Year!
Remember that thing you were going to do,now is the time.It's time for us all to strive and plan out for the year ahead.Go kick boot in 2017
@HelixelGoddess Same here. Last few months haven't been great for my output. We can do it!

Got reminded of that 'Once I was 7 years old' song today.Looked it up on youtube.
Over 400m views.
This is why we can't have nice things.
@nellucnhoj A song crafted from pure annoyance. The purest of pure. Never want to hear that shlock again.
@nick_gonzo Just like Superman did with Nuclear Weapons in IV. Wait...that turned out fine...right?
@DaveHendrick RTE did one on Murakami a few years back that was decent. More about his life than animation but worth a look.
@CoupeReVille Damn this is sweet,Stef!
@AdlaiM YES! Inferno is up atm. Seen a bit of it before,fantastic from what I've seen.
My delight at finding another Herzog Documentary on @NetflixUK . Please - more of this.
@PaddyLynch4 Trash Humpers.
@Sean_Munger Can't say! Could be considered a spoiler but it was just a minor detail.
Rogue One was consumed. Liked that ending very much. One detail left me perplexed but overall solid,if flawed. https://t.co/QwGXJn45r8
Rest well,Carrie Fisher. You beat the odds.
Since I saw Arrival, gave me the interest to check out Sicaro which has been on my list.Excellent tension throughout https://t.co/Sk5BcZyi71
@MistraScruff Yeah,can't imagine the frustration all those attempts were,dreading having to face him again. Punishing yet strangely fun.
@MistraScruff So nerve racking I bet! Not going to try again until I get a bit more stamina on me. You did a good job here taking him down
@nvalkyrja Happy birthday!
@MistraScruff Took me about 5 minutes frantically slashing and healing. Cornered it and rotated around it.
Brighter news - downed that Cleric Beast! Wasn't much trouble which I was expecting. Think I'm getting used to this now!
Update : Met Father Gascoigne there. Well...met his blades as I died. Least can level up now!
Watched Boyhood last night.Despite it's impressive gimmick of having characters age on screen it just lacked impact. https://t.co/TiWe6ADt9R
@MistraScruff That's an accurate description of all that's happened so far. I'm quite into first area right now and so anxious.
This game.is.tough. Jesus. Barely making progress. Glad I didn't stream this...I'm terrible 😂
@nvalkyrja They're rather fetching,aren't they?
About to start Bloodborne,meet Facekicker VIII #PS4share https://t.co/oUqR1lQNwF

Merry Christmas everyone!
Watch and play all the things. Santa's watching. He needs validation to live.
@roceidcal @Treestumped @fffits Is the blu ray affected by this too? Is it out on blu ray even?
@Treestumped @roceidcal @fffits Why are Dvd's weird about things like this? They have a serious history of pulling weird edits.
@fffits @Treestumped @roceidcal Ah here,that is misery. That's a Christmas tragedy.
@fffits @Treestumped Well there's the...actually can't even think of an adaptiobln that compares to Muppets. Yep,they nailed it.
1st Xmas film down - Werner Herzog's documentary about the internet.Fascinating watch that explores its consequences https://t.co/BjhS1JNYaZ
@AdlaiM @jp_jordan I wouldn't want to tell them THAT! It's been a rough year...
Merry Christmas! Spare a thought for all the holiday demons who have to wait out the hours to torture the children. https://t.co/JvpP9bIBqZ
Mine would have to be Limbo. Never knew how much I'd need a story and world like it wove. Most unique comic I picked up in a while. Read it!
Favourite new comic discovery of this year?
@LoMcNamee Praise be the babby Jaysis 👼
@LoMcNamee Top up while you can 💪
